extendedInfo.description: âââ Pre-Scheduled & Hidden/Stealthy Recording & Transformation Service âââCinixSoft Voice Recorder is the only audio & voice recorder in the market with capability to preschedule periodical recording for the future (daily, weekly, monthly or even yearly). It is smart and easy. Use this app to record meetings, lectures, and personal notes, etc., without any time limits.âââ Localization for English, German, Italian, French, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Chinese-- Apps under the lineâEasy and Smart Voice RecorderâVoice Recorder PRO = Easy and Smart Voice Recorder + 15 ImprovementsâVoice Recorder PRO as Notepad = Easy and Smart Voice Recorder + 19 Big Improvements-- Core featuresâ Prescheduled Recording: The only voice/audio recorder in the market for prescheduled recordings. Based on built-in sophisticated scheduling strategy, it is very easy to schedule any future recordings. The repeating of prescheduled recording can be configured as daily, weekly, monthly or yearly which gives you full freedom to suit your needs.â Hidden/Stealthy: The voice/audio recorder is running totally in the background. Once you have configured it, it will run smoothly without your care. It still works even when you switch off the screen of the device or exit the app or even reboot your deviceâ Selectable Audio Format: Choose either mp4, 3gp or wav as the audio format. Compared with traditional format wav, the two formats mp4 and 3gp enable much longer recording time, but with lower quality.â It's easy to share and manage your recordings through e.g. facebook, email or other possible methods. Recorded audios can also be copied into the device's external storage for further use.â No time limits: Recording length unlimited and depends only on free memoy.â Provide three transformation services: Speech-to-Text (Transcription), Text-to-Speech (Natural Voice) and Text-to-Text (Translation). Note that you need to pay for these services.-- Following 11 more features are in both Voice Recorder PRO and Voice Recorder PRO as Notepad A1. Without AdsA2. Flick your finger to switch tabsA3. Use finger gesture to zoom in/out day viewA4. Delete or change single entry of repeating eventA5. Provide option to add app widget on home screenA6. Noise filtering for wav audioA7. Silence skipping for wav audioA8. Pre-amplification and gain calibration for wav audioA9. Display waveform for .wav audioA10. Continuous recording of .wav audioA11. Option to delete old audio files automatically-- Further, in Voice Recorder PRO,B1. No internet connection and related permissions needed (100% secure, but password protection, automatic upload and transformation services are unavailable)C1. Call interaction: Stop recording when call comes in or goes out.C2. App interaction: Stop recording when specific apps are started.C3. Adjustable Sampling rate-- and in Voice Recorder PRO as Notepad,B1. Notepad as app name and app iconB2. Password protection and recoveryB3. Automatic upload of audio files to FTP serverB4. Call interaction: Stop recording when call comes in or goes out.B5. Transformation services (Speech-To-Text Transcription, Text-to-Speech using natural voice, Text-to-Text Translation). Note that you need to pay for these services.C1. Automatic email uploadC2. App interaction: Stop recording when specific apps are started.C3. Adjustable Sampling rateAll Bx-features are already included while the Cx-features need to be purchased further by in-app billing.-- PermissionsNeeded permissions are only limited to finish the tasks defined in the app.No internet permission needed for "Voice Recorder PRO", 100% secure. For "Voice Recorder PRO as Notepad", internet permission is needed for eventual password recovery and automatic upload.Keywords: smart voice recorder, easy voice recorder, hidden recorder, audio recorder, voice recorder, prescheduled recording, secret recorder, spy recorder, pre-configured voice recorder

reviews.title: Password Protection Working Fine now
reviews.comment: Thanks for the quickest response from any technical team, I had seen so far in my career. Password protection was only thing not working till now and after fixing that problem, this is the most useful app for me in my nexus-4.
reviews.author: Rajeev Ranjan

reviews.comment: This soon has great potential,  would give 5 stars if the playback recording didn\'t sound like it was underwater.  Can barely hear my recording . If that could be fixed I\'d buy upgrade.
